body_html: OK, it looks like your GPU is running out of memory when you try to run the eval. You seem to have a GTX 750 with 2GiB of RAM. It's possible that copying all of the MNIST test images and labels to the GPU exhausts its memory. I'd suggest batching the test data (e.g. taking 50 images at a time) and aggregating the accuracy in your Python code.

body: OK, it looks like your GPU is running out of memory when you try to run the eval. You seem to have a GTX 750 with 2GiB of RAM. It's possible that copying all of the MNIST test images and labels to the GPU exhausts its memory. I'd suggest batching the test data (e.g. taking 50 images at a time) and aggregating the accuracy in your Python code.
